agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM Thursday, February 7, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: The Committee will have an organization meeting to adopt rules and conduct other business. The following nominees will appear: Court of Appeals for the Tenth Court of Appeals District John Edward Neill Appointed 01-07-19 for a Birdwell Johnson County term to expire 12-31-20 Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Court of Appeals District Keith David Stretcher Appointed 01-07-19 for a Seliger Midland County term to expire 12-31-20 Court of Appeals for the Thirteenth Court of Appeals District Gregory Thomas Perkes Appointed 01-28-19 for a Hinojosa Nueces County term to expire 12-31-20 Criminal District Attorney, Navarro County William James Dixon Appointed 01-28-19 for a Birdwell Navarro County term to expire 12-31-20 Office of the Secretary of State Gregory D. Whitley Appointed 12-17-18 for a Campbell Travis County term to expire 01-16-23 __________________________________________________________________________________
